name: Organismes de placement collectif en valeurs mobilières (OPCVM): utilisation de documents d'informations clés - Undertakings for collective investment in transferable securities (UCITS): the use of key information documents - Verwaltungsgesellschaften von Organismen für gemeinsame Anlagen in Wertpapieren (OGAW): Verwendung von Basisinformationsblättern -  - Jonás Fernández - Proposition de la Commission et amendements
title: Undertakings for collective investment in transferable securities (UCITS): the use of key information documents
